justification: “Values data was collected with a 40-item … Schwartz Portrait Values Inventory questionnaire (PVQ-40; Schwartz et al., 2001).”
Participants were “sequentially presented with … eight Raven's Progressive Matrices (RPM)… intended to investigate values-related biases in fluid intelligence.”
The study included “a Guilford et al.'s (1978) Alternative Uses Test (GAUT) of creativity.”
